widgets.title: Device Owner's Digital Identities and Access

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}" WITH _class='Device'
(THAT (HAS|OWNS|MANAGES) User)?
THAT (IS|OWNS|MANAGES) Person
THAT IS User 
THAT (HAS|ASSIGNED) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application)
RETURN TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}" with _class='Device'
(THAT (HAS|OWNS|MANAGES) User)?
THAT (IS|OWNS|MANAGES) Person
THAT IS User 
(that has UserGroup)?
that (assigned|has|uses) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application|Token)
(that assigned AccessPolicy)?
(that allows *)?
RETURN TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND unique "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}" WITH _class='Device'
that has (Finding|Problem) as f
return 
  f._type, 
  f.displayName, 
  f.description, 
  f.severity, 
  f.numericSeverity,
  f.status,
  f.createdOn,
  f.updatedOn,
  f.webLink
